description: Numbers n such that n*2^n-n-1 is prime.
comments: The corresponding primes are given in A046842.
maple: A046843:=n->`if`(isprime(n*2^n-n-1), n, NULL): seq(A046843(n), n=1..1000); # _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Oct 12 2014
author: _Felice Russo_
extensions: Sign in definition corrected by _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 10 2010
More terms from _Harvey P. Dale_, Oct 10 2011
